UW-Madison has its own [local Carpentries community](https://hub.datascience.wisc.edu/communities/carpentries/) which is actively engaged in developing and teaching new ML/AI workshops. To be notified of upcoming workshops offered by the Carpentries and other organizations at UW-Madison, make sure to subscribe to the [Data Science @ UW Newsletter](https://datascience.wisc.edu/newsletter/).
